meanings.definition: A device used to remove gas from a liquid.
meanings.sent1: The factory installed new degassers to improve the quality of the water.
meanings.sent2: The scientist invented a more efficient degassers for the laboratory experiments.
meanings.sent3: The degassers at the aquarium decided to go on strike, causing bubbles to fill the tanks.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a degassers, removing all the tension from the room.
meanings.sent5: The degassers hummed softly as it worked its magic on the fizzy drink.

meanings.sent1: The degassers in the room were all in need of maintenance.
meanings.sent2: She counted the degassers in the lab and realized one was missing.
meanings.sent3: The degassers gathered for their annual convention to discuss new techniques.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with degassers, each one ready to be put to work.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were lined with degassers of all shapes and sizes, waiting to be used.
